column5: Beautiful new modern home with large wrap around deck over looking the river.   Sleeps 7 comfortably, can sleep extra with air mattress's.   Property features: Traeger grill, kayaks, fire pit, fishing and swimming.  Large laundry room.  Great local restaurants, wine tasting, antique shops, boutiques all within walking distance.  Great for family vacation/ reunion/ holiday!
column8: The Loop River Lodge B #3 New Modern Home Sleeps7
